name: Drained: An Audarun Tale
description:
Drained: An Audarun Tale is an exploration game about finding out what happened to a desert village community. You are tasked with collecting logbook entries left behind by a former overseer. Combining those entries with visual evidence found throughout the village will help you figure out what happened. Pay attention to details, since a difficult decision awaits you at the end.

Gameplay

The gameplay of Drained: An Audarun Tale is all about exploring the desert village, searching for logbook entries and combining what you read with what you see to get a clear image of what occurred in the village. Don't expect any fast paced combat or running around: it is a true walking simulator.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Walk

E - Interact

J - Open Journal
